Elementary Education (K-6).1: Make content knowledge accessible to students in all content areas including language arts, science, math, social sciences, and the arts.
Elementary Education (K-6).2: Design, deliver, and assess effective instruction.
Elementary Education (K-6).3: Create and maintain a respectful, productive classroom learning environment.
Elementary Education (K-6).5: Teach in consideration of student development, diversity, and special needs.
